instructions:
In a large skillet sauté chopped onion in oil for about 4 minutes. Then add crumbled ground beef and
brown until no longer pink. Add spaghetti sauce, tomatoes, chili powder, cumin and corn and simmer for 15
minutes *(if olives are used, add during last 2 minutes of simmering)*. Makes about 5 cups of sauce. Serve
over favorite pasta with parmesan cheese. Serves 4.
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) Mexican style stewed tomatoes, cut up
1 cup frozen or canned corn niblets
name: Tex-mex Pasta
